question: What significant historical status was granted to Jihlava, Czech Republic in 1982?
true_answer: It was declared an urban monument reservation.
asked_question_translated: Status historis penting apa yang diberikan kepada Jihlava, Republik Ceko pada tahun 1982?
answer: Pada tahun 1982, Jihlava, Republik Ceko diberikan status Area Reservasi Sejarah (Historic Reservation Area).
answer_translated_eng: In 1982, Jihlava, Czech Republic was granted Historic Reservation Area status.
